Hi! I'm Hanna and I am a junior at Colorado State University studying Ecosystem Science and Sustainability with a Zoology minor. At CSU, I am a member of the Outdoor Club! I am passionate about wildlife conservation and rehabilitation and hope to work in that field after college.
